sentence: Great conference hotel very clean friendly staff and excellent amenities
Beautiful business meeting
A lovely beach front resort with a conference center equals a win win
Not only did they take care of us during the event they also went out of their way to try to ensure we had a wonderful time following the event
Stayed several days here for the antibody engineering meeting
I was attending SFA conference and really enjoyed business meeting with great pleasure
Great place for a convention or for leisure with a couple cool bars and restaurants in Petes and the WaterTable
I attended a conference at the Hyat Regency
The grounds rooms pools and conference rooms were all well maintained and very comfortable
Went to a business event here and the event space was very nice
I had an emergency business meeting that I was called out of town
I wish when I arrived I used a bell hop because in a stay of two days I never found an easy route from the room to the conference location
Had a meeting at the Hyat HB and used valet
I was there for a conference which I was looking forward to attending
I was here for a conference so I had a standard room overlooking one of the pools and the power plant so not the best view
The conference facilities were better than most although the rooms were chilly

For some reason my meetings were mainly centered at the reception lobby end of the hotel but someone had thought it was a good idea to put me almost at the very end room 2539 which meant that to go and eat attend my meeting or just grab a bite to eat or purchase something from the little village of stores they have it was a 10 minute walk
The only thing wedding ballroom was quite a distance from the room we stayed at
There was two weddings happening there when I went for a conference
Other than that the food at the grill polside Sunset Grill and convention center was good
My husband joined me for a work conference at this resort
They had a few conferences going on and I am sure they were busy
